name: INTermsAndConditions
desc: The terms and conditions of service when making restaurant reservations.

items.name: init(localizedTermsAndConditionsText: String, privacyPolicyURL: URL?, termsAndConditionsURL: URL?)
items.desc: Initializes the terms and conditions object with the specified information.

items.name: var localizedTermsAndConditionsText: String
items.desc: A localized, user-readable string that summarizes the terms and conditions of your company’s services.

items.name: var privacyPolicyURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL to your company’s privacy policy web page.

items.name: var termsAndConditionsURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL to your company’s terms and conditions web page.
